about_the_game:
This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game.

This token pack contains 32 new character tokens for use as PCs or NPCs.

  • Angel_Female_Battlemage
  • Astral_Male_Wizard
  • Drow_Male_Whipmaster
  • Dwarf_Female_cleric
  • Dwarf_Male_fighter_axe
  • Dwarf_Male_fighter_hammer
  • Dwarf_Male_Tinkerer
  • Elemental_Male_Swordmage
  • Elf_Male_Archer3
  • Elf_Male_Archer
  • Elf_male_rogue_fighter
  • Elf_Male_Warrior
  • gnome_male_caster
  • Halfling_Female_mage
  • HalfOrc_Male_fighter2
  • HalfOrc_Male_mage2
  • Human_Male_Archer3
  • Human_Male_Cleric2
  • Human_Male_Cleric4
  • Human_Male_Cleric5
  • Human_Male_Cultist
  • Human_Male_DarkAcolyte1
  • Human_male_duelist
  • human_male_fighter5
  • Human_male_fighter_Flail
  • Human_male_mage5
  • Human_Male_Mage_purpleVariants
  • Human_Male_Mage_purple
  • Human_Male_Warlord_towershield
  • Human_Male_young_mage
  • Human_Male_Zarclax

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for hearing background music
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for hearing background music
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

short_description: This product is token module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. This token pack contains 32 new character tokens for use as PCs or NPCs.
